description: start up Magnolia and display the logs
option-tomcat-description: set the path to the "apache-tomcat" directory or the directory containing it; defaults to the current working directory
option-lightModulesPath-description: set the path to the light modules directory; defaults to mgnl.config.js or "magnolia.resources.dir" in "magnolia.properties"
info-press-ctrl-c: Press CTRL+C to terminate the process
info-using-cwd-tomcatPath: Using tomcat path "{{path}}" found in current working directory
info-using-plugin-tomcatPath: Using tomcat path "{{path}}" set by plugin argument in mgnl.config.js
info-using-option-tomcatPath: Using tomcat path "{{path}}" set by command option
warn-cannot-parse-server-xml-port: Unable to parse port from server.xml; will try using default port 8080
warn--path-does-not-exist-option: Provided {{context}} path "{{currentPath}}" set by option doesn't exist
warn--path-does-not-exist-plugin: Provided {{context}} path "{{currentPath}}" set by plugin argument in mgnl.config.js doesn't exist
warn--path-does-not-exist-global: Provided {{context}} path "{{currentPath}}" set by global argument in mgnl.config.js doesn't exist
warn-during-shutdown-wait-logs-will-appe: Logs will continue to be displayed during the shutdown wait period
error-port-in-use: The port {{port}} is currently in use by another process
error-mgnl-shutdown-failed: Failed to gracefully shut down Magnolia instance
You may need to terminate it manually by running following command:
error-use-jumpstart: Consider running: `npx @magnolia/cli jumpstart` command to initialize a new project
error-java-not-installed: Java is required to start Magnolia
Follow the steps at: https://docs.magnolia-cms.com/product-docs/6.3/developing/magnolia-front-end-development/install-magnolia/#_get_java to install it
error-java-home-not-set: JAVA_HOME environment variable is not set
JAVA_HOME is required to start Magnolia
Follow the steps at: https://docs.magnolia-cms.com/product-docs/6.3/developing/magnolia-front-end-development/install-magnolia/#_get_java to set it
ora-start-waiting-s: Waiting {{seconds}} second(s) before the next shutdown attempt... ({{attempt}} attempt(s) left)
ora-succeed-shutdown: The shutdown of Magnolia has been successful
ora-fail-all-shutdown-attempts: Failed to shutdown Magnolia after {{total}} attempts
